subject: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
IMF Treasury Department's Office of Foreign Assets Control
(OFAC)IMF Treasury Department's.
Address: 700 19th Street, N.W., Washington, D.C. 20431.
Attn: Dear
This email has been issued to you again in order to Officially inform you that we have completed an investigation on an International compensation Payment in which was issued to you by the I.M.F  With the help of our newly developed technology (International Monitoring Network System)
we discovered that you were not able to complete your transfer because of the amount involved. During our investigation we discovered that
your fund (US$20,500,000.00 ) is still available and we have authorized the fund to be paid to you via a Certified Cashier's Check and ATM card
Choose from the both options of payment and send your request to the ATM cards Department immediately to proceed with the payment. Make sure
you send your contact. Such as Your Name,  Phone Number,Address, Country and City to avoid wrong delivery:
Contact the OFFICE in charge via Email: 
uba67341@hotmail.com
Best regards
Mr. Arvin Kyles
IMF Treasury Department's Office of Foreign Assets Control
(OFAC)IMF Treasury Department's

subject: Re:  IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello Mr. Arvin Kyles,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the payment. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify what exactly this payment is for? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the situation.

Also, could you explain more about the Certified Cashier's Check and ATM card options? How do they work and what are the differences between them? 

Lastly, I would like to know how long it will take for the payment to be processed and delivered once I provide my contact information.

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Breanna

subject: Re: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello Breanna

Please, kindly be informed that your approved funds have been forwarded to
the management of the KBC Bank of Belgium? I shall give you the Bank
contact details as soon as O hear back from you.

Sincerely Yours,

subject: Re: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello Breanna,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared about my approved funds being forwarded to the KBC Bank of Belgium. Could you please provide me with more details about this bank? I would like to know how I can contact them and proceed with the necessary steps.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Breanna

subject: Re: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello Breanna

Apologies for my late response.

We have arranged with the management of the KBC Bank of Belgium to pay you
through their Online Wire Transfer Platform. All you need to do now is to
contact the Bank management as they are waiting to hear from you.

Bank Name: KBC Bank of Belgium
Rdpt Robert Schuman 4, 1040
Bruxelles, Belgium
Contact Person: Andrew Sacco
Email: andrew.sacco@kbc-corporation.com

Contact ANDREW SACCO and quote your approved amount and keep me posted.

Keep me posted as soon as you hear from the Bank management.

Sincerely Yours,
ARVIN KYLES

subject: Re: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello Arvin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information about the payment arrangement with KBC Bank of Belgium. Could you provide me with more details on how to proceed with contacting Andrew Sacco at the bank? I want to make sure everything is done correctly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Breanna

subject: Re: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you provide more details about how I should contact Andrew Sacco at the KBC Bank of Belgium? I want to make sure I do it correctly.

Best wishes,
Breanna

subject: Re: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello Breanna

Send an email to the management of the KBC Bank of Belgium and request for
their Account Opening Form. They shall set up your Online Account as soon
as you submitted your Account Opening Form to them. Your total approved
funds is $10,500,000.00 only.

Sincerely Yours,
ARVIN KYLES

subject: Re: IMF Treasury Department's Off
body:
Hello Arvin,

Thank you for sharing this information. Could you please provide me with more details on how to contact the management of KBC Bank of Belgium? I am interested in learning more about their account opening process.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Breanna
